content.title: Picket Fences Reap the Whirlwind (TV Episode 1995)
content.stars: Tom Skerritt, Kathy Baker, Costas Mandylor
content.description: As a tornado threat hangs over Rome, Wambaugh and his wife quarrel over his remarks at their 50th anniversary party. Meanwhile, the Brocks worry over Kimberly who's away at college. Kenny ...
